title: One Piece Episode #500 Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A review of One Piece's milestone 500th episode, discussing how the show continues its storyline without fanfare, focusing on the flashback arc involving young Luffy, Ace, and Sabo. The reviewer notes the sense of impending doom as events seem about to 'literally explode.'

title: One Piece – Post War Arc (Episodes 493 – 516) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Post-War Arc including Episode 500. The review describes the arc as 'half flashback, half training arc' that explores Luffy's traumatic past with Ace and Sabo while the crew prepares for the New World. Discusses how episodes 497-499 are filler before episode 500 gets back on track.

title: Never Watched One Piece - Episodes 499-504 Review
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A detailed blog review covering episodes 499-504 including Episode 500. The blogger notes that 'Episode 500 opened on an ominous note' with the storm destroying the boys' refuge. Describes the emotional impact of 'watching Sabo beating on that door screaming for Ace and Luffy' as particularly sad.

title: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast - Episodes 514-516: End of the Paramount War Arc
author: The Going Merry Podcast
description: A podcast episode covering the end of the Paramount War/Post-War Arc (episodes 514-516), which includes discussion of the arc that contains Episode 500. The podcast covers character rankings, arc analysis, and the crew's preparations before the time skip.

title: One Piece Collection 21 [Episodes 493-516] Review
author: Animation For Adults
description: A review of the DVD/Blu-ray collection containing episodes 493-516, which includes Episode 500. Notes that the collection delivers 'plenty of the over-the-top action, comedy and melodrama' that One Piece is known for. Originally broadcast between April and September 2011.
